creditline: Gift in memory of Nucy Meech from her children Laurie, Christopher, Charlie and Julie
description: tan and terracotta pigment on unrolled eucalyptus bark panel, mounted to a backing board with metal cable
image_copyright: Copyright of the artist%2C artist%27s estate%2C or assignees.
text: These paintings represent male and female Lightning Figures, as indicated by the arcs that encircle their bodies.
title: Bark Painting of a Woman
